org.apache.solr.common.params

Class AppendedSolrParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.common.params.SolrParams
      • org.apache.solr.common.params.DefaultSolrParams
        • org.apache.solr.common.params.AppendedSolrParams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AppendedSolrParams
extends DefaultSolrParams
    SolrParams wrapper which acts similar to DefaultSolrParams except that it "appends" the values of multi-value params from both sub instances, so that all of the values are returned.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Description copied from class: SolrParams
        Like SolrParams.toQueryString(), but only replacing enough chars so that the URL may be unambiguously pasted back into a browser. This method can be used to properly log query parameters without making them unreadable.

        Characters with a numeric value less than 32 are encoded. &,=,%,+,space are encoded.

        Overrides:
        toString in class DefaultSolrParams
